MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the FK4 postcode area of Bonnybridge affecting properties in Bankhead Crescent and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:45pm, this is to complete the final repair on an underground cable fault on Bankhead Crescent and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:10pm on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
